url_already_exists.message: The URL "{url}" is already in use. Please choose a different one.

yaml_mode_deprecated.description:
Starting with Home Assistant 2026.6, the default Lovelace dashboard will no longer support YAML mode. To migrate:

1. Remove `mode: yaml` from `lovelace:` in your `configuration.yaml`
2. Rename `{config_file}` to a new filename (e.g., `my-dashboard.yaml`)
3. Add a dashboard entry in your `configuration.yaml`:

```yaml
lovelace:
  dashboards:
    lovelace:
      mode: yaml
      filename: my-dashboard.yaml
      title: Overview
      icon: mdi:view-dashboard
      show_in_sidebar: true
```

4. Restart Home Assistant
yaml_mode_deprecated.title: Lovelace YAML mode migration required

reload_resources.description: Reloads dashboard resources from the YAML-configuration.
reload_resources.name: Reload resources
